tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE diversity_inclusion_metrics (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gender VARCHAR(255),
  race_ethnicity VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  tenure_years INT
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gender VARCHAR(255),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    department VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE inclusion_metrics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_satisfaction_score INT,
    inclusion_training_completed BOOLEAN,
    diversity_hiring_goal_met BOOLEAN,
    employee_feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE diversity_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inclusion_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DiversityAndInclusionMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeFeedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  date_submitted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CompanyInitiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DepartmentMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  diversity_score FLOAT,
  inclusion_score FLOAT,
  survey_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InclusionTraining (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  training_id INT NOT NULL,
  training_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  duration_hours INT,
  training_date DATE
)
